    program_modules package¶

    Submodules¶

    program_modules.bond_functions module¶

    program_modules.bond_functions.bond()[source]¶

    Calculates and displays the bond repayment breakdown.

    program_modules.bond_functions.bond_inputs()[source]¶

    Return figures for bond calculation.

    Returns:

    figures as list

    program_modules.bond_functions.table_bond_result(figures: list, result: float)[source]¶

    Formats and displays bond results as a table using the tabulate module.

    Parameters:

    • figures – figures from user inputs

    • result – calculation result

    program_modules.investment_functions module¶

    program_modules.investment_functions.compound_interest(figures: list)[source]¶

    Calculates and returns compound interest return.

    Parameters:

    figures – list of required figures

    Returns:

    float result value

    program_modules.investment_functions.invest_inputs()[source]¶

    Returns figures required to calculate investment return.

    Returns:

    list of figures

    program_modules.investment_functions.simple_interest(figures: list)[source]¶

    Calculates and returns simple interest return.

    Parameters:

    figures – list of required figures

    Returns:

    float result return

    program_modules.investment_functions.table_invest_result(figures: list, result: float)[source]¶

    Formats and displays investment results as a table using the tabulate module.

    Parameters:

    • figures – figures from user inputs

    • result – calculation result
